text: Paul-Mohamed Kalambay Otepa (12 November 1948 â€“ 12 November 2024) was a Congolese football goalkeeper. He played for Congo DR national football team. He made an appearance during the 1974 FIFA World Cup.1974 FIFA World Cup Germany He also played for TP Mazembe. Otepa was born in Belgian Congo. Otepa died on his 76th birthday in Kinshasa, DR Congo on 12 November 2024. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo footballers
title: Kalambay Otepa
